thread.title: Gwyneth Paltrow moves forward with Brad Falchuk
thread.title_full: Gwyneth Paltrow moves forward with Brad Falchuk - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Gwyneth Paltrow moves forward with Brad Falchuk
text:
Actress Gwyneth Paltrow has reportedly given Brad Falchuk keys to her house.
READ: Gwyneth Paltrow uses `Ironman` to mark gender pay gap in Hollywood
The 43-year-old, who has been dating the Glee co-creator for more than a year, is said to be practically living with him at her mansion in Brentwood, California, reports femalefirst.co.uk.
"They spend every minute together as it is, so it just seemed silly to not make it official. Still, this was a big step forward for Brad and Gwyneth," Star magazine Quote: d a source as saying.
The couple earlier went public with their romance at the Scream Queens premiere here and Paltrow, who has daughter Apple and son Moses with former husband Chris Martin, even shared a photograph of her "date" on Instagram.
"She's so happy to have found a man like Brad," the source added.
